e.g. Graydon, Euler / Hermes

Graydon requests; Removed error message if a DHIC does not exists

send Graydon requests

Pushbutton handling
-- Call directly screen to add a source request if no one exist
-- Tabular view source requests
-- Create new limit source request
-- In case of new source request is added, close program to process
updates on CLCR level in calling program
... else go back to tabular view
-- Link on CLSR / CODE are used to present received data from external limit
requests as tooltip (e.g. Euler / Hermes)
